title: Ana Costa-Ramón
text:
I am an Assistant Professor at the Department of Economics at the University of Zurich and the Jacobs Center for Productive Youth Development. 
I am also a Research Affiliate at CEPR.
I received my Ph.D. in economics from Universitat Pompeu Fabra in 2020.
I am an applied microeconomist mainly interested in Labor, Gender, and Health Economics.
